title: Bar Rescue Host on Opening New Franchise
itunes:title: Bar Rescue Host on Opening New Franchise
description:
Jon Taffer, Host and Executive Producer of Bar Rescue, discusses opening the "world's safest restaurant" franchise.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
